class_notes: Online asynchronous with Two Onsite Intensives dates: TBD
course_description: Students will develop advanced knowledge, assessment, and management skills when caring for the high-risk neonate and family. Emphasis is on fetal and neonatal physiological differences, pathogenesis of common disease states, scientific rationale and best practices for care and ethical issues.
sections: Class Nbr: 3956, Section #: 1, Type: LEC, Campus: ATL, Meets: Meets Online, Instructor: M. Conway-Orgel, Status: Open
